ai.summary: A very short, easy riverside stroll along Brookside Path in the UK. At only 0.1 km, itâ€™s ideal for a quick outdoor moment, families with small children, or a gentle stretch between activities.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat and smooth underfoot, with a mix of pavement and compacted earth. Expect occasional damp patches after rain and some areas that may be slick in wet weather.
ai.safety_notes: Despite the short distance, stay aware of your surroundings: watch for uneven surfaces, slippery patches when wet, and other path users. Wear sturdy footwear, bring a light layer, check the forecast, and keep children within sight. Carry a phone for emergencies.
ai.best_seasons: Year-round, with particularly pleasant conditions in late spring to early autumn.
